body_html:
@alanpurple what methods do you use to pipe data to GPU vs TPU on the local video card?

CUDA 10 support CUDA 9, so as with any upgrade, there should be no issues going down to CUDA 2 or something.

IBM - Python has no way of accessing tensor cores at this time:
https://developer.ibm.com/articles/ba-accelerate-python/

How to use Tensor Cores in CUDA 9:
https://devblogs.nvidia.com/programming-tensor-cores-cuda-9/

CUDA 10 support CUDA 9, so as with any upgrade, there should be no issues going down to CUDA 2 or something.
IBM - Python has no way of accessing tensor cores at this time:

body:
@alanpurple what methods do you use to pipe data to GPU vs TPU on the local video card?

CUDA 10 support CUDA 9, so as with any upgrade, there should be no issues going down to CUDA 2 or something. 

IBM - Python has no way of accessing tensor cores at this time:
https://developer.ibm.com/articles/ba-accelerate-python/


How to use Tensor Cores in CUDA 9:
https://devblogs.nvidia.com/programming-tensor-cores-cuda-9/
